title: Stripper Draven Skin (Because of his Birthday)

replies.body: Change the name To Daaancer Draven and remove visable pubic heir, and we are good, because bad as some female champs may be none of them are actually named after a adult entertainment trade, it can be obvious what he is, like Battle Bunny Riven but actually saying it crosses a few censorship lines,
How to get around legal issues 101 is now in session.
Hey they managed to get Riven out in a costume based on adult entertainment by just not calling "Skin magazine model Riven"

This splash is an amazing piece of art! Truly outrageous.

The idea as it stands might be a little too much for our PG-13 rating (although for the longest time Gangplank was rocking monster lower-belly hair) but the theme is strong. Draven loves to entertain, be the center of attention, be adored and showered with money. It's literally his passive >:D

It's also true that some skins like Battle Bunny Riven and the Police skins for Caitlyn and Vi seem more fan-service than function. Heartseeker Varus was a conscious effort to re-balance those scales and I think we can do more. I'll go ask Draven if he's up for showing more skin.
call it fanservice draven. it fits his theme, wanting his fans to adore him.

Uhhhh... Hey Draven, I mean DRRRAAAAAVVVVEEEEENNNN, would you be down with a stripper skin?

{{champion:119}} : (Rips off clothes) Done and Done.
 
Rito: You need pants!

{{champion:119}}  : Draven does nothing Half-assed.

>Draven does nothing Half-assed.

*Quietly throws 50 gold at Draven's feet...*

I think it's good you're considering it. It bugs me that so many female champs are basically next to naked or have stripper themes, but we have almost no male skins like that ;_; ~ I want more fan serviceeeeee even pool party graves was a step in the right direction. 

TLDR, more hot naked men please.
Look who showed up on PBE today >XD

but that pants are to low
thats the only problem
that and the name

You could probably work the idea into a Heartseeker skin for Draven, since those skins go to marksmen anyway. Maybe for Valentine's Day next year?

Please no. I'm tired enough of all the female "gamers" on these boards talking about how they would literally drop their panties for/sacrifice themselves to {{champion:157}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:126}} etc.

inb4 "But {{champion:22}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:92}} got fanservice skins!" There is a difference between fanservice and literally portraying a champion as a sex worker.

I'm a guy and I would play Draven just for the stripper skin.

No homo.
ALL OF THE HOMO
You can be my wing-man any time Yugi.
His joke should be him screaming "No Homo!" or "Hah GAY!"
It's Dravensexual.
Nope Just Draven but you know what it needs? MORE DRAAAAAAAAAAVVVEENNNNNNN

I'm sorry, but what?

We have all sorts of fantasy skins for female champions, including things like Battle Bunny Riven. There are very few "sexy" trope skins for guys. Stop being so ridiculous! If you get to objectify women, we get to objectify men bro. Does he somehow look more like a sex worker than Riven wearing a fucking skintight bunny outfit? Really?

I know all the females got so excited for heartseeker {{champion:110}}. As much as the skin disturbs me, I personally don't have a problem with it's existence.

Having a straight-up stripper {{champion:119}} goes too far however. It's like the male equivalent to a pornstar {{champion:103}} skin.

hes not nude, just shirtless its not going too far (the name, maybe.) A lot of the skins for the female champions have their boobs popping out. The ladies of league deserves eye candy as much as the guys.

There are already a lot of male champions that are running around without their shirts, although they aren't all the best to look at ({{champion:79}}).  But hey, there are some scantily clad males/male skins that aren't Gragas.

I'm not saying this skin shouldn't go out (other than League would probably have to step up from "Mild Suggestive Themes"), but there are already some pretty hot dudes in just their pants running around ({{champion:63}}).
I mean, there IS El Tigre Braum ;)
{{champion:201}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:86}} Also need some sexy skins but yes I totally want stripper Draven. It'd probably need to be renamed something less blatant like Partyboy Draven.
Fireman {{champion:201}} Studyr {{champion:77}} Gayren {{champion:86}}
Ugh everyone loves to act like male fanservice skins are just now starting to show up but i mean have you seen pool party graves abbs??!!!

This is a beautiful idea. It needs to be an ultimate skin.

He can start out fully clothed and lose them as he levels his ultimate, eventually wearing only underwear.
This.. this is beautiful
And at the end his underwear falls off to reveal a Draven Head because it needs more DRAVEN

I thought the glove was Ezreal's.

I have 3 big problems here....and like 4 small problems.
___
first the Big Problems.
1.{{champion:119}}  by lore nature is a literal show off/center stage sort of person. so this skin doesn't fully match is personality.
2.he's crazy he doesn't go on stage for money.
3. the pants are to low.
___
the small.
1. the face just looks off. like he's been smacked in the back of the head.
2. the name is really just a no.
3. his tattoos shouldn't change just cause his close do.
4. just no.(ran out of problems)
___
Now lets go into how to make this a reality.
honestly DRAVEN! (with the gusto) is shirtless in his gladiator skin so I see no quarrel with the over all cloths. That said I feel that that setting just doesn't SCREAM DRAAAVVVEEEEENN! {{champion:119}} 
to fix this is really simple change the back ground ,lift the pants a little higher, have the name say "CENTER RING DRAVEN!" with the same cloths only in kind of a circus tent with all the lights on him as he shows off his skills. you know the main attraction to an event. something that just screams draven is showing you how to throw an axe with style.
___
{{champion:119}} "DRAVVEEEN OUT!"

>1. by lore nature is a literal show off/center stage sort of person. so this skin doesn't fully match is personality.
2.he's crazy he doesn't go on stage for money.
3. the pants are to low.

1. Strippers hold the center stage (have you seen some (wo)men), and he'll be *"showing off"* quite a bit...
2.  Do you know what his passive is.
3. The only problem with the pants is that they're still on.

So you'll sexually objectify women to the extreme... but men can't be shirtless with low-cut jeans.

*Golf Clap*
Literally, i need this skin. RITO-SENPAI, NOTICE THIS POST
Thats really nice. Needs a happy trail and im all set.
I think we need to talk about the... Ezreal in the room.
Make it an ultimate skin. Ill buy the fuck out of it. Take my money.
Do this.
I'd be down for this, if they make a matching skin for Gragas.  Like dancer Gragas, where he looks like Chris Farley in the chippendales SNL sketch. It could be the ultimate skin.
